title: You Are Being Microtargeted
description:
Why you should know about microtargeting, and how it works in political advertising.

Featuring:
@EmilyStewartM
@davidkgoldstein

Links to resources discussed:
Why everybody is freaking out about political ads on Facebook and Google

Campaigns Say  Google Ad Policy Sidesteps Problem of Disinformation

Cambridge Analytica’s “psychographic microtargeting”: what’s bullshit and what’s legit

Reset episode on Twitter banning political ads

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
